Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking between two large complexes along Hillborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: Hillborough Way continues to the east and west, running between two large shopping complexes. To the north, you can see the Lankshire Hall of Wonders and to the south is Nathan's Light Armory. Both shops may be entered from their respective plaza entrances (located to the west of here on Hillborough Way).
